text.トレセン学園では日々たくさんの出来事が起こります。\\n<color=#ff99: A lot of things happen every day at the Tracen Academy. Choose a <color=#ff9900>nurturing scenario</color> and solve the problems surrounding the school. Conquering these scenarios will help your horse girl grow!
text.ウマ娘と<color=#ff9900>トゥインクル・シリーズ</color>で3: Spend 3 years with Uma Musume in the <color=#ff9900>Twinkle Series</color> and work together to make their <color=#ff9900>dreams come true</color>! The Uma Musume's goals are diverse. Guide many different girls to become a great trainer.
text.ウマ娘たちは個性豊かな子ばかり。\\nウマ娘ごとに基礎能力やスキル、適性などが異: All of the Uma Musume have unique personalities. Each Uma Musume has different basic abilities, skills, and aptitudes. You can train them as many times as you like, so let's start by <color=#ff9900>raising your favorite Uma Musume</color>.
text.<color=#ff9900>想い（因子）</color>を受け継がせてみましょ: Inheriting <color=#ff9900>feelings (factors)</color> increases ability and aptitude at the start of training, and your Uma Musume will grow through <color=#ff9900>Inheritance Events</color>. Inherited girls won't disappear from the Hall of Fame, so take advantage to raise stronger Uma Musume!
text.サポートカードを<color=#ff9900>編成</color>してみましょう: <color=#ff9900>Organize</color> support cards to receive corresponding <color=#ff9900>support effects</color> and <color=#ff9900>training events</color> from those characters. Note that you can not use cards of the Uma Musume you are training.
text.サポートカードには<color=#ff9900>タイプ（得意トレーニング）</c: There are <color=#ff9900>types (specialty training)</color> of support cards. The effects they exhibit when training together are different.
text.育成中にサポートカードの絆ゲージを上げて、\\n得意トレーニングを行うと<col: When you raise the bond gauge of your support card during training and perform your specialty training, <color=#ff9900>Friendship Training</color> will occur. In Friendship Training, your Uma Musume will grow bigger than normal!
text.<color=#ff9900>強化アイテム</color>を使用して<color: Use <color=#ff9900>enhancement items</color> to increase your <color=#ff9900>Awakening Lv</color>. Raising your Awakening Lv will increase the number of skills you can acquire during training. Reinforcement items can be obtained through training and daily races.
text.<color=#ff9900>ウマ娘のピース</color>を使用して<colo: Use <color=#ff9900>Uma Musume pieces</color> to <color=#ff9900>uncap</color> them. This will increase the basic ability of the Uma Musume. Also, when they reach the rank of ★3, they will receive a <color=#ff9900>victory outfit</color>.
text.<color=#ff9900>サポートPt</color>と<color=#ff: Use your <color=#ff9900>Support Pt</color> and <color=#ff9900>Money</color> to <color=#ff9900>increase the Lv</color>. As the Lv increases, your support effects will increase, giving you an edge in your training. Strengthening items can be obtained through training and daily races.
text.<color=#ff9900>同一のサポートカード</color>を使用して<c: Use <color=#ff9900>copies of the same support card</color> to <color=#ff9900>uncap</color>. Uncapping increases the upper level limit and you can further strengthen the support card's Lvl.
text.複数枚所持しているサポートカードは<color=#ff9900>蹄鉄</colo: Support cards dupes can be converted into <color=#ff9900>Horseshoes</color>. These valuable items can be exchanged in the store. The first support card you acquire will be stored in the support card list, subsequent cards will be displayed in the vault and can be converted.
text.育成を完了すると<color=#ff9900>殿堂入りウマ娘</color>とな: When you complete training, your Uma Musume will be saved in the <color=#ff9900>Hall of Fame</color>. Once there, she can enter the team stadium and various races, can be inherited in training, or transferred, upon which she is irrevocably lost.
text.育成ウマ娘のピースは<color=#ff9900>クローバー</color>に変: Uma Musume pieces can be converted into <color=#ff9900>clovers</color>. Clovers are valuable and can be exchanged for items in the store. Be careful when converting pieces, as they can be used to release the Uma Musume you are training and to develop new talents.
text.チーム＜シリウス＞を率いて、\\nウマ娘たちと<color=#ff9900>メイ: Lead your team, Sirius, through the <color=#ff9900>main story</color> with the Uma Musume! You can earn rewards by progressing through the story.
text.育成ウマ娘と出会ったり<color=#ff9900>親愛度</color>を高め: The <color=#ff9900>story of Uma Musume</color> can be progressed by meeting Uma Musume and increasing their <color=#ff9900>level of affection</color>. You can earn rewards by progressing through the story.
text.殿堂入りウマ娘で<color=#ff9900>チーム</color>を結成し、\: Form a <color=#ff9900>team</color> of Hall of Fame Uma Musume and compete against teams from all over the country in the <color=#ff9900>team arena</color>. Your team's <color=#ff9900>CLASS</color> will increase according to its success, and each week you will earn rewards according to the CLASS you belong to.
text.優れたレース結果を残すと<color=#ff9900>ハイスコア</color>: A <color=#ff9900>high score</color> will be recorded for outstanding race results. Each week, the CLASS to which you belong will change based on your high score.
text.チーム競技場では、一度に<color=#ff9900>条件の異なる5レース</c: In the team arena, five races with different <color=#ff9900>conditions</color> are held at a time. The higher your CLASS, the more people you can run in each race, up to a maximum of 15 Uma Musume. Form the strongest team you can and challenge the team arena!
text.<color=#ff9900>殿堂入りウマ娘</color>たちを編成し、<co: Form your own <color=#ff9900>team</color> of <color=#ff9900>Hall of Famers</color>. For each of the five races with different conditions, choose the Uma Musume with the best aptitude. The <color=#ff9900>ace</color> horse girl will get <color=#ff9900>1.1 times</color> the score.
text.強い殿堂入りウマ娘を編成すると、\\n<color=#ff9900>チーム評価<: The more strong Uma Musume you have in your team, the higher your <color=#ff9900>team rating</color> will be and the higher your <color=#ff9900>team rank</color> will be. The higher your team rank, the more rewards you can earn.
text.チーム競技場では<color=#ff9900>チーム評価の近い相手</color: In the team arena, you will play against <color=#ff9900>opponents with similar team ratings</color>. The higher your team rating, the higher your score will be. Form a strong team and conquer the team arena!
text.殿堂入りウマ娘でレジェンドレースに挑戦してみましょう。\\nレースの着順が良いほ: Challenge the Legend Race with your saved horse girls. The higher you finish, the more rewards you get. Tickets required for participation are replenished at 05:00 during the event period and when the LEGEND Uma Musume is switched.
text.殿堂入りウマ娘でデイリーレースに挑戦してみましょう。\\n挑戦するレースに応じて: Challenge your Hall of Fame horse girl to a daily race. You can earn various rewards depending on the races you challenge. Each day, you will receive up to the <color=#ff9900>maximum number of tickets</color>.
text.練習では、<color=#ff9900>好きな条件で</color>自由にレース: In Practice, you can freely hold races under <color=#ff9900>any conditions you want</color>. In addition to the Hall of Fame Uma Musume you have bred, you can also run races with <color=#ff9900>other trainers' Uma Musume</color>. You can train with up to 18 Uma Musume at once!
text.チーム競技場やルームマッチなどで見かけた気になるウマ娘を\\n<color=#f: If you see any Uma Musume you like in the team arena or room match, you can register her as your <color=#ff9900>Training Partner</color> so that you can run races with her. The representative horse girl of the friends you are following will also be able to run in the race.
text.自慢の<color=#ff9900>殿堂入りウマ娘</color>をサークルやS: You can <color=#ff9900>share</color> your favorite <color=#ff9900>Hall of Fame Uma Musume</color> with your circle and SNS. Actively register your Practice Partners from circle members and friends to enhance your practice!
text.全国のトレーナーたちと<color=#ff9900>サークルに加入</color: Join a <color=#ff9900>circle</color> with other trainers from around the country. You can interact with other members and help each other with training.
text.メンバー同士で<color=#ff9900>様々なアイテム</color>を贈り: Members can give each other a <color=#ff9900>variety of items</color>. You can also rent each other's <color=#ff9900>representative Uma Musume</color> for inheritance at a discount.
text.獲得した<color=#ff9900>楽曲</color>のライブを視聴すること: <size=26>You can watch live performances of <color=#ff9900>songs</color> you have acquired. Choose main and back dancers from trained Uma Musume and acquired costumes to watch the live with your favorite combination. Songs marked with <color=#ff9900>"Singing"</color>, are voiced by the selected Uma Musume. Songs can be acquired through the main story and training.</size>
text.トレーナー情報の確認や設定が行えます。\\n<color=#ff9900>誕生日: You can check and set your trainer information. On your <color=#ff9900>birthday</color>, you will receive a congratulatory comment from Uma Musume on the home screen, and changing your <color=#ff9900>gender</color> will change some scenarios.   (Gender can be changed at any time)
text.<color=#ff9900>代表ウマ娘</color>や<color=#ff9: You can set up <color=#ff9900>representative Uma Musume</color> and <color=#ff9900>support cards</color> to help your followers in their training. You will earn <color=#ff9900>Friend Pt the next day</color> depending on the number of times you do this. (This will be given as a gift)
text.<color=#ff9900>称号ミッション</color>や<color=#f: You can earn titles through <color=#ff9900>title missions</color> and <color=#ff9900>events</color>. You can change the title you have earned at any time.
text.理事長の夢に協力し、コンプリートを目指してみましょう！\\n育成中の重賞レースや: Help the Chairman reach her dream! You can earn <color=#ff9900>trophies and rewards</color> when you win graded races during training, or Legend Races. In addition, you can earn rewards by completing missions to collect the specified number of trophies.
text.<color=#ff9900>フォロー</color>したフレンドの代表ウマ娘や: You can select the representative horse girl and support card of the friends you <color=#ff9900>follow</color> from each list in training. You also earn more Friend Pt by helping a <color=#ff9900>mutual follower</color> to train. If you don't have many followers, try looking in the <color=#ff9900>recommendations</color>.
text.ウマ娘に関わる記録を集めて<color=#ff9900>名鑑Lv</color>: Collect records related to Uma Musume to raise your <color=#ff9900>Index Lv</color>. You'll accumulate Index Exp based on the evaluation points you've earned through training and the stories you've viewed, and you'll earn rewards as your Index Lv increases.
text.狙いを定めてウマ娘ぬいぐるみ（ぱかプチ）をGETしましょう！\\n挑戦回数<co: Take aim and get the Uma Musume Plushie (Paka-Puchi)! If you can get at least one of them in <color=#ff9900>3 attempts</color>, you've succeeded. Your Uma Musume might then wake up with a <color=#ff9900>new hint</color>!
text.<color=#ff9900>CLASS2</color>昇級おめでとうございま: Congratulations on your <color=#ff9900>CLASS 2</color> promotion! The <color=#ff9900>second slot</color> for team formation has been released. The second slot for team formation has been released, allowing you to organize more Uma Musume for the Hall of Fame.
text.<color=#ff9900>CLASS3</color>昇級おめでとうございま: Congratulations on your <color=#ff9900>CLASS 3</color> promotion! The <color=#ff9900>third slot</color> for team formation has been released, allowing you to organize more Hall of Fame Uma Musume.
text.育成では、ウマ娘ごとに設定された<color=#ff9900>目標レース</co: The aim of the training is to achieve good results in the <color=#ff9900>target races</color> set for each horse girl. In order to achieve good results in races, you need to <color=#ff9900>develop your basic abilities</color> through <color=#ff9900>training</color>!
text.<color=#ff9900>スキル</color>を獲得することで、<colo: By acquiring <color=#ff9900>skills</color>, you can gain a <color=#ff9900>variety of effects</color> in <color=#ff9900>races</color>. The Skill Points needed to acquire skills are mainly obtained through races, but can also be obtained through some events.
text.<color=#ff9900>体力が少なくなったり</color>、<color: If your Uma Musume's <color=#ff9900>energy or motivation is low</color> she will not be able to perform at her best in training or races. <color=#ff9900>Resting</color> restores energy, and <color=#ff9900>going out</color> boosts motivation. Always pay attention to her condition!
text.育成中、ウマ娘のトレーニングや体調に悪い影響を及ぼす\\n<color=#ff9: During training, you may acquire <color=#ff9900>conditions</color> that have a negative effect on your horse girl's training and physical condition. The <color=#ff9900>Infirmary</color> has a chance of eliminating bad conditions, so make use of it quickly.
text.ウマ娘の育成中はさまざまなコマンドを実行できます！\\nそれぞれのコマンドをバラ: You can execute various commands while training your Uma Musume! Use each command in a well-balanced manner to make your Uma Musume into a great Uma Musume!
text.ジュニア級6月後半からは<color=#ff9900>レース</color>に出: <size=26>From the latter half of June in Junior class, you can start <color=#ff9900>racing</color>. Train your horse girl well and aim for <color=#ff9900>first place</color>! In races, you earn <color=#ff9900>Skill Points</color> to acquire skills and <color=#ff9900>Fans</color> to run in big races, based on your finishing position. You'll also earn random items based on your position and margin.</size>
text.ウマ娘たちは<color=#ff9900>メイクデビュー</color>で初めて: Uma Musumes make their first appearance on the racing stage in their <color=#ff9900>make debut</color>. If they finish first, they can run in various races. If they don't, you'll have to try to win one of the <color=#ff9900>Maiden Races</color> available!
text.トレーニングで得られるスピードやスタミナなどの<color=#ff9900>基礎: color=#ff9900>Basic abilities</color> such as speed and stamina, gained through training, are linked to <color=#ff9900>the various abilities displayed during races</color>. Which you need varies greatly with <color=#ff9900>distance</color> and <color=#ff9900>running strategy</color>, so <color=#ff9900>create a training menu that suits her</color>!
text.レースが行われる<color=#ff9900>バ場</color>と<color: The <color=#ff9900>surface and distance</color> where the races take place differ. Your Uma Musume suits different tracks depending on her <color=#ff9900>surface and distance aptitudes</color>. Aim for races that are <color=#ff9900>marked with a ★</color> in the list, and go for the win!
text.レースは<color=#ff9900>プレオープン・オープン・GⅢ・GⅡ・GⅠ<: The races are divided into five grades: <color=#ff9900>Pre-Open, Open, GIII, GII, and GI</color>. Let's start with the <color=#ff9900>Pre-Open, Open</color> to win the highest G1 race in the Twinkle Series!
text.<color=#ff9900>体力</color>を消費して<color=#ff: You can grow your horse girl's <color=#ff9900>basic abilities</color> by spending <color=#ff9900>energy</color> to <color=#ff9900>train</color> her. In addition to <color=#ff9900>recovering</color> energy, more <color=#ff9900>Skill Points</color> can be gained from the Wisdom training than other training.
text.<color=#ff9900>サポートカード</color>に編成されたウマ娘と: Training with Uma Musumes organized as a <color=#ff9900>support card</color> will increase your <color=#ff9900>training efficiency and bond gauge</color>. When the bond gauge is full, <color=#ff9900>Friendship Training</color> can occur. You may <color=#ff9900>gain various benefits</color> if certain others watch you train as well.
text.トレーニングでサポートカードのウマ娘に<color=#ff9900>「！」マーク: When a support card horse girl has a <color=#ff9900>! mark</color> on her, grab your chance to <color=#ff9900>increase Hint Lv of one of this partner's skills</color> upon successfully completing the training session. This will confer a <color=#ff9900>discount on the Skill Pt needed to acquire the skill</color>.
text.ウマ娘の<color=#ff9900>体力が少ない</color>状態でトレーニ: If you train your Uma Musume when her <color=#ff9900>energy is low</color>, she may <color=#ff9900>fail the training</color> and her ability may not improve. There are <color=#ff9900>various disadvantages</color> to failing a training session, so always keep an eye on her <color=#ff9900>energy and failure rate</color>!
text.<color=#ff9900>スキルPt</color>を消費することで、レース: By spending <color=#ff9900>Skill Points</color>, you can acquire <color=#ff9900>skills</color> that activate during races. There are various conditions to activate skills, such as the <color=#ff9900>race distance and running strategy</color>, so try to <color=#ff9900>acquire skills that match her aptitudes</color>.
text.<color=#ff9900>サポートカードイベント</color>や<colo: The <color=#ff9900>hint Lv</color> of a skill may be increased by the result of a <color=#ff9900>Support Card or Uma Musume Event</color>. The skill Pt you <color=#ff9900>consume will be discounted</color> depending on the hint Lv, so organize support cards that have the skills you want to acquire to get the best deals.
text.スキルには大きく分けて次の3種類があります。\\n・<color=#ff9900: <size=26>There are three main types of skills. <color=#ff9900>Unique skills</color> are special skills that your horse girl starts with. <color=#ff9900>Rare skills</color> are powerful skills found in special situations. <color=#ff9900>Normal Skills</color> are skills found in various situations. There are also skills that can only be acquired by <color=#ff9900>inheriting certain factors</color>.</size>
text.サポートカードのLvを一定までUPすると\\n<color=#ff9900>チー: If you raise the level of your support card to a certain level, you will get a <color=#ff9900>support cheer bonus that will increase your score in the team arena</color>. Let's raise the lvl of many support cards!
text.イベントやキャンペーンなどで解放された<color=#ff9900>限定ストーリ: You can view <color=#ff9900>limited stories</color> that have been released through events and campaigns.
text.イベント期間中に<color=#ff9900>ウマ娘を育成</color>し、<: During the event period, <color=#ff9900>train your horse girl</color> and earn <color=#ff9900>Event Points</color> By collecting Event Points, you can earn various <color=#ff9900>rewards</color>.
text.イベントPtを集めることで\\n<color=#ff9900>イベント限定ストー: Collecting Event Points will allow you to advance through the <color=#ff9900>event-only story</color>. By advancing the story and clearing event missions, you can earn <color=#ff9900>event limited support cards, rainbow fragments, and titles</color>.
text.イベントミッションをクリアすると\\n<color=#ff9900>イベントPt: You can get <color=#ff9900>Event Pt and Roulette Coins</color> by completing event missions. You can also earn Roulette Coins from the <color=#ff9900>daily missions</color>
text.<color=#ff9900>ルーレットコイン</color>を使って<colo: You can play <color=#ff9900>roulette derby</color> using <color=#ff9900>roulette coins</color> If you <color=#ff9900>achieve bingo</color>, you can get <color=#ff9900>event limited support cards and gold fragments</color>.
text.イベント期間中に<color=#ff9900>ウマ娘を育成</color>したり: During the event period, you can earn <color=#ff9900>roulette coins</color> by <color=#ff9900>training Uma Musume</color> and completing <color=#ff9900>event missions</color> If you collect <color=#ff9900>roulette coins</color>, you can challenge the <color=#ff9900>roulette derby</color>.
text.ルーレットダービーでの着順に応じて\\n<color=#ff9900>ルーレット: You can get <color=#ff9900>roulette rewards</color> according to your finishing order in the roulette derby. When you get a roulette reward you've never gotten before, it's your chance to BINGO!
text.獲得したルーレット報酬に応じたマスが埋まります。\\n縦・横・斜めの連続する3マ: Cells will be filled according to roulette rewards earned. When 3 consecutive squares are filled (on any axis), <color=#ff9900>a line is completed</color>, and you will receive a <color=#ff9900>BINGO reward</color> based on number of lines. Complete <color=#ff9900>8 lines of BINGO</color>to exchange your sheet.
text.6月後半と12月後半のターン終了後に開催される\\n<color=#ff9900: Run in the <color=#ff9900>Aoharu Hai</color>, held the turn after June and December end, and aim for victory with your team. Winning will increase your <color=#ff9900>team ranking</color>, and your <color=#ff9900>Uma Musume and team members will grow</color>.  Train strong Uma Musume to <color=#ff9900>win lots of Aoharu Hai</color>!
text.チームメンバーを編成して、アオハル杯の優勝をめざしましょう！\\nアオハル杯は各: Put together a team to win the Aoharu Hai! With races in each category, the winner will be the one with <color=#ff9900>more wins</color> out of five. <color=#ff9900>Winning raises your team ranking</color>, more so the higher your opponent's ranking.
text.集めたピースを使用することで、育成ウマ娘を<color=#ff9900>解放</: By using the pieces you have collected, you can <color=#ff9900>release</color> your breeding horse girl. Once released, you will be able to take charge of them in training.
text.3人のウマ娘を出走登録し、1レースごとに<color=#ff9900>全国のトレ: Register your three Uma Musume for each race, and <color=#ff9900>match</color> them against trainers <color=#ff9900>from all over Japan</color> in real time Train strong Uma Musume and win against trainers from all over Japan!
text.<color=#ff9900>オープンリーグ</color>と<color=#f: There are two leagues, the <color=#ff9900>Open League</color> and the <color=#ff9900>Grade League</color>, and you can choose the one that suits you best Depending on the league, the upper limit of the <color=#ff9900>breeding rank</color> of the Hall of Fame horse girl you can register to run in the race will differ.
text.<color=#ff9900>ルームマッチ</color>は、他のトレーナーたち:
<color=#ff9900>Room Match</color> allows you to race against other trainers with your Hall of Fame horse girl
<color=#ff9900>Host</color>: Set your own conditions for the race
<color=#ff9900>Join</color>: Join another trainer's race.
<color=#ff9900>Watch</color>: Enter an ID to watch the race.
text.開催されるレースはGⅠが舞台となります。\\nレースを開催する場合は、2つのモー: The race held will be GI. There are two modes. <color=#ff9900>Simple Mode</color> allows you to hold a race right away. <color=#ff9900>Detailed mode</color> allows you to choose weather, participation conditions, etc. first. Up to <color=#ff9900>3 Uma Musume per person</color> can be entered.
text.<color=#ff9900>リーグの中は3つのラウンド</color>で構成さ: <color=#ff9900>The league is made up of three rounds</color>. Starting from Round 2, you will be divided into Group A and Group B, and the places you advance to will depend on your performance in each round and group. Let's move on to the final round and win the <color=#ff9900>winner</color>!
text.開催したレースは参加リストから参加者を募集できます。\\n<color=#ff9: Recruit participants for your races from the participation list. Trainers close to you can also be recruited using the <color=#ff9900>Circle and SNS Sharing functions</color>. For future reference, <color=#ff9900>you can save your favorite races</color>. Have a go organizing a race with your friends!
text.特別移籍では殿堂入りウマ娘を<color=#ff9901>他のチームに移籍させる: In the special transfer, you can transfer your Hall of Famer to another team and get a reward. Please note that once you send a Hall of Famer to another team, she will be gone and you will not be able to get her back.
text.移籍先チームの希望する条件に応じて<color=#ff9901>お礼品の内容が変: <color=#ff9901>Reward contents will change</color> by application conditions of the team you wish to transfer to. In addition, each has its own expectations, and <color=#ff9901>the higher these are, the more luxurious</color> the reward for sending them Uma Musume.
text.期待度の高い募集の中にはお礼品として\\n移籍した<color=#ff9901>: Teams with high expectations will reward a piece of the transferred <color=#ff9901>Hall of Fame Uma Musume</color> as a thank you gift.
text.チームメンバーに特殊なアイコンが出ているトレーニング場所で\\nトレーニングを行: If you train at a training location where a team member has a special icon, "<color=#ff9900>Aoharu Special Training</color>" will occur, and <color=#ff9900>that team member's basic abilities will increase</color>. Let's use the Aoharu Training to grow our team so we can win the Aoharu Hai!
text.さらに、<color=#ff9900>2人以上</color>のチームメンバーと: Furthermore, a Special Training session <color=#ff9900>with 2 or more</color> team members, will <color=#ff9900>boost your Uma Musume's training efficiency</color> as well. <color=#ff9900>Basic abilities and skill points gained</color> will also increase <color=#ff9900>the more team members</color> participate. However, <color=#ff9900>more energy is consumed</color>.
text.アオハル特訓を何回も行ったチームメンバーは、\\n一度だけ<color=#ff9: Team members you have had many Special Trainings with can have an <color=#ff9900>Aoharu Spirit Explosion</color> once. Their <color=#ff9900>basic abilities will increase greatly</color> and <color=#ff9900>your Uma Musume will also grow and get Skill Hints</color> The key to success is <color=#ff9900>generating many Aoharu Spirit Explosions</color>!
text.現在持っているアイテムを確認することができます。\\nまた、消費アイテムを使用す: You can check the items you currently have. You can also use consumable items. Some items can be converted to Money. <color=#ff9900>Converting items cannot be undone</color>, so be careful.
text.チームメンバーが成長することで、<color=#ff9900>チーム総合力</c: As team members grow, <color=#ff9900>team strength</color> will increase and you will receive gifts from Tazuna. Also, each member's <color=#ff9900>Training Lv will increase</color> with their basic ability. <color=#ff9900>The strength of your team will lead to the growth of your Uma Musume</color>, so be proactive in training your team!
text.<color=#ff9900>チーム称号</color>とは、チーム総合力とチー: The <color=#ff9900>team title</color> is an <color=#ff9900>evaluation of your overall</color> team strength and team ranking. <color=#ff9900>The better the team title you have, the more your horse girl will grow in the ending</color> Let's win Aoharu Hai and get the strongest team title!
text.<color=#ff9900>イベントブースト</color>は、育成開始時にT: Using <color=#ff9900>Event Boost</color>you can spend twice the TP at the start of training to gain double the <color=#ff9900>Event Pt</color> and <color=#ff9900>Roulette coins</color> at the end.
text.<color=#ff9900>同一のサポートカード</color>を使用して<c: You can <color=#ff9900>uncap</color> support cards by using <color=#ff9900>duplicates of the same card</color>. The level limit will be increased. SR and SSR support cards can also be uncapped by using <color=#ff9900>Release Crystals</color>.
text.<color=#ff9900>ショータイムモード</color>で育成を完了する: When you complete training in <color=#ff9900>Showtime Mode</color>, your <color=#ff9900>SHOW Gauge</color> will rise according to your goal achievement rate and the difficulty level. You will receive <color=#ff9900>additional rewards</color> according to the number of times you've filled your SHOW Gauge to MAX.
text.ショータイムモードでは、育成中のレースで、\\n<color=#ff9900>レ: In Showtime Mode, the <color=#ff9900>opponent Uma Musume</color> will become stronger in training races. When you see the <color=#ff9900>good ending of your Uma Musume</color> at the chosen difficulty level, the next level will be unlocked and can be challenged from next training.
text.<color=#ff9900>適性に合わせたウマ娘</color>を育成したり、: You can earn more points by training Uma Musume <color=#ff9900>according to their aptitude</color> and by achieving the specified <color=#ff9900>Score Bonus</color> conditions.
text.「<color=#ff9900>トレーナー技能試験</color>」で、\\n試: In the <color=#ff9900>Trainer Proficiency Exam</color>, you can check the <color=#ff9900>usage rate of support cards</color> for each test in the ranking!
text.本育成シナリオでは育成ウマ娘それぞれの目標はなく、\\n<color=#ff99: A scenario without individual goals, <color=#ff9900>instead chasing "Result Points"</color>. Acquire fixed amounts from each of the 3 years! You can freely enter any races during training, and obtained Pts depend on the race's grade and finishing position!
text.<color=#ff9900>育成目標をすべて達成</color>すると\\n<: <color=#ff9900>Once all training objectives are complete</color>, you can challenge the <color=#ff9900>Twinkle Star Climax</color>! Emerge victorious over the 3-race battle to claim your place as "Twinkle Top Star"!
text.レースで入着すると成績Ptのほかに<color=#ff9900>「ショップコイン: When entering races, you will <color=#ff9900>obtain Shop Coins</color>! Shop Coins can be traded for training items in the special shop. Training items can increase stats, recover energy, boost training growths, and have <color=#ff9900>various other effects that are sure to help your training</color>!
text.<color=#ff9900>毎年12月後半のターン終了時</color>に、各: <color=#ff9900>After each second half of December</color>, when changing years, <color=#ff9900>the most outstanding horsegirl is recognized</color>. Do well in races while deepening bonds with your supporters to increase your fans! When chosen, your horsegirl's unique skill will level up, in addition to other improvements!
text.育成中、レースに「ライバル」が出走することがあります。\\nライバルがいる<co: Sometimes Rivals will enter races. When <color=#ff9900>entering and winning those races</color> your <color=#ff9900>horsegirl's stats will grow</color>, and she can <color=#ff9900>obtain Skill Hints</color>. Grow your horsegirls more by having them fight these tough opponents!
text.トゥインクルスタークライマックスでは、\\n<color=#ff9900>各レー: In the Twinkle Star Climax, <color=#ff9900>you gain Result Pt based on your finishing position</color>, and the <color=#ff9900>horsegirl with the most Pts over 3 races is the winner</color>. Aim for the top with your carefully trained horsegirl!
text.繰り返し練習したいウマ娘たちを<color=#ff9900>マイ出走リスト</c: Save Umas in <color=#ff9900>My Entrants</color> to <color=#ff9900>select them easily</color> during registration! You can also save them from the results screen. Removing Training Partners, will remove them from My Entrants as well, so be careful!
text.全試験の<color=#ff9900>最高スコアでランキングTOP100位</c: You can view the <color=#ff9900>Top 100 highest scorers</color> in the ranking! The <color=#ff9900>Top 30 Uma Musume </color>can be<color=#ff9900> rented without limit</color> in the relevant scenario.
text.<color=#ff9900>トライアルコイン</color>は試験によって得ら: <color=#ff9900>Trial Coins</color> are earned for exams, and extra can be earned through <color=#ff9900>Score Bonuses</color>, <color=#ff9900>Exam Grades</color>, and <color=#ff9900>Missions</color>.
text.<color=#ff9900>強化アイテム</color>を使用して、\\n育成: You can increase the <color=#ff9900>Hint Lv</color> of your horsegirl's skills by using <color=#ff9900>upgrade items</color>. When doing so, she will start training with her <color=#ff9900>Hint Lv already raised</color> for those skills.
text.レーシングカーニバルのレースに出走すると<color=#ff9900>カーニバル: Race in the Carnival to gain <color=#ff9900>Carnival Pts</color>. Points are awarded for skill uses and finishing position.
text.<color=#ff9900>カーニバルレース</color>に挑戦すると<co: As you complete <color=#ff9900>Carnival Races</color>, your <color=#ff9900>Challenge Gauge</color> will fill. When full, you can enter a <color=#ff9900>Challenge Race</color>. Challenge Races come in <color=#ff9900>VERY HARD and EXTREME</color> difficulties.
text.イベントレースで5着以内に入ると<color=#ff9900>カーニバルボーナス: Your horsegirl will gain the <color=#ff9900>Carnival Factor</color> when finishing top 5 in an event race. When a horsegirl inherits this factor, she will gain <color=#ff9900>bonus stats and a chance to max mood</color> in the event races.
text.<color=#ff9900>カーニバルボーナススキル</color>を持つウマ: When a horsegirl with the <color=#ff9900>Carnival Bonus Skill</color> finishes top 5 in an event race, the factor will <color=#ff9900>Lv up</color>. The <color=#ff9900>stat bonus and max mood chance will increase</color> with skill level.
text.レーシングカーニバルのレースで獲得した<color=#ff9900>カーニバルP: The <color=#ff9900>Carnival pts</color> obtained in Racing Carnival races can be <color=#ff9900>traded for items</color> in the shop!
text.デイリーレジェンドレースに挑戦してみましょう。\\n対戦するLEGENDウマ娘に: Challenge the daily Legend races! Pieces of the challenged Legend horsegirl can be acquired. Tickets will <color=#ff9900>refill to max</color> every day.
text.自分だけの<color=#ff9900>オリジナル名刺</color>を作成して: Create your own <color=#ff9900>Trainer Card</color>, and share it as an image on social media. Show your info along with horsegirl, support and <color=#ff9900>customizable graphics</color>.
text.代表ウマ娘が所持している<color=#ff9900>因子情報</color>に: <color=#ff9900>Factors</color> for your representative horsegirl can also be <color=#ff9900>shared on social media</color>. Show off your glorious horsegirl on your card!
text.<color=#ff9900>フォト機能</color>を活用することで、<co: The <color=#ff9900>Snapshot function</color> allows you to take photos of <color=#ff9900>Races, Lives, and Stories</color>. Snapshots can be processed and edited in a few ways to add your own flair.
text.撮影したフォトは<color=#ff9900>フォトライブラリ</color>に: Saved snapshots are stored in the <color=#ff9900>Photo Library</color> and accessible at any time、They can also be used on your <color=#ff9900>Trainer Card</color>.
text.初めての育成は、まずはウマ娘たちをより知るために\\n<color=#ff990: For your first training <color=#ff9900>we recommend you play the URA Finals scenario</color> to get to know the horsegirls better! Many things happen on the path you both take towards her unique goals. Aim to win on the big, dream-like stage of the URA Finals!
text.本育成シナリオでしか見られない、\\n<color=#ff9900>シナリオ専用: Each scenario <color=#ff9900>has many exclusive events!</color> We hope you will enjoy discovering new aspects of the horsegirls through their daily life and their expressions as they go through the seasons!
text.<color=#ff9900>みんなでトップウマドルプロジェクト</color>: <color=#ff9900>Everyone's Top Umadol Project</color> is an event where rewards are gained for obtaining fans through training. Personal rewards are obtained based on total fans gained in training mode.
text.<color=#ff9900>ゴルシちゃんモード</color>で育成を完了する: When finishing training in <color=#ff9900>Golshi-chan Mode</color> you will gain rewards based on progress. In Golshi-chan mode \n<color=#ff9900>opponents in races</color> will be stronger.
text.イベント全体報酬は<color=#ff9900>イベントに参加した全トレーナーが: Overall rewards are based on <color=#ff9900>total fans gained by all trainers in the event</color>. The more fans, the more luxurious the rewards.
